languages.text: "Услышать мало. Чем раньше ты начнешь путь к искуплению, тем лучше".
"Hearing is not enough. The sooner you start on the path to redemption, the better."
languages.original_text: "Услышать мало. Чем раньше ты начнешь путь к искуплению, тем лучше".

traits.locale_text: "Hearing is not enough. The sooner you start on your path to redemption the better."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «No basta con entender. Cuanto antes emprenda el camino hacia la redención, mucho mejor para usted».
languages.original_text: "Hearing is not enough. The sooner you start on the path to redemption, the better."

traits.locale_text: «No basta con entender. Cuanto antes emprenda el camino hacia la redención, mucho mejor para usted».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “仅仅‘听到’是不够的，你最好早点踏上救赎之路。”
languages.original_text: "Hearing is not enough. The sooner you start on the path to redemption, the better."

traits.locale_text: “仅仅‘听到’是不够的，你最好早点踏上救赎之路。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Il ne suffit pas de comprendre. Plus tôt vous emprunterez le chemin de la rédemption, mieux ce sera. »
languages.original_text: "Hearing is not enough. The sooner you start on the path to redemption, the better."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne suffit pas de comprendre. Plus tôt vous emprunterez le chemin de la rédemption, mieux ce sera. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「聞くだけでは足りない。贖罪への道を歩み始めるのは早ければ早いほどいい」
languages.original_text: "Hearing is not enough. The sooner you start on the path to redemption, the better."

traits.locale_text: 「聞くだけでは足りない。贖罪への道を歩み始めるのは早ければ早いほどいい」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hören reicht nicht. Je eher Ihr den Pfad der Wiedergutmachung einschlagt, desto besser."
languages.original_text: "Hearing is not enough. The sooner you start on the path to redemption, the better."

traits.locale_text: "Hören reicht nicht. Je eher Ihr den Pfad der Wiedergutmachung einschlagt, desto besser."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Anlamak yetmez. Arınma yoluna ne kadar çabuk baş koyarsan o kadar iyi."
languages.original_text: "Hearing is not enough. The sooner you start on the path to redemption, the better."

traits.locale_text: "Anlamak yetmez. Arınma yoluna ne kadar çabuk baş koyarsan o kadar iyi."
